author: um3ha4a
body:
Hi,
On Raspberry, there are a lot of operating systems, like Raspbian, CentOS ARM, FreeBSD ARM, Kali linux ARM, OpenWRT...
I use powershell mainly on Raspberry, so which operating systems does powershell support?

comments.author: anzenketh
comments.body: Please see https://devblogs.microsoft.com/powershell/powershell-core-6-0-generally-available-ga-and-supported/ for the supported platforms.

title: Which Raspberry device's operaring system does powershell support?
